name: Convert Data
description: Convert data operation enables data conversion from legacy formats to FHIR format.

parameter.name: inputDataType
parameter.documentation: The format of input data. Supported formats - `Hl7v2`, `Ccda` and `Json`.

parameter.name: templateCollectionReference
parameter.documentation: Reference to a template collection which can be the default templates, or an image on Azure Container Registry that the FHIR server can access. Supported values - `microsofthealth/fhirconverter:default` or `microsofthealth/hl7v2templates:default` for input data type `Hl7v2`, `microsofthealth/ccdatemplates:default` for input data type `Ccda`, `microsofthealth/jsontemplates:default` for input data type `Json`, `<RegistryServer>/<imageName>@<imageDigest>`, `<RegistryServer>/<imageName>:<imageTag>`.

parameter.name: rootTemplate
parameter.documentation: The root template to use while transforming the data. Supported default values - `ADT_A01`, `OML_O21`, `ORU_R01`, `VXU_V04` for input data type `Hl7v2`, `CCD`, `ConsultationNote`, `DischargeSummary`, `HistoryandPhysical`, `OperativeNote`, `ProcedureNote`, `ProgressNote`, `ReferralNote`, `TransferSummary` for input data type `Ccda`, `ExamplePatient`, `Stu3ChargeItem` for data type `Json`.
